column4: can someone tell me if sqlite offers website editing options?
and does anyone know how much it could be affecting my computer performane to be using ubuntu with an unsupported chipset
2 parts one, i have an unsupported chipset how bad could this be affeting my computer performance and 2, does anyone know anything about sq lite?
shouldn't really matter all that much; sqlite is just a smaller SQL server you can use, doesnt support everything MySQL does, but its pretty good
